abilities.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

additionalInformation: On his third death and onwards, Roshan drops the Aghanim's Blessing - Roshan as a third item if he was slain in the Radiant pit. In the Dire pit, he drops a Refresher Shard instead.
Adds 5800 networth to the hero consuming the item.
name: Aghanim's Blessing - Roshan
description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
trivia: When selecting Roshan, this item can be seen in his inventory.
